Calculation z-score with cohort statistics

Source: R/score.R
calculate_zscore_from_stats.Rd

Calculate z-scores of the fitting parameters (logIC50, logAUC, etc.). The z-score is calculated based on the cohort_stats table

Usage

calculate_zscore_from_stats(tbl, con, cohort_id, ...)

Arguments

tbl

A tibble with at least the following columns:

  • drug_id

  • and the metrics selected in ...

con

A DBIConnection-class object to a DRP database

cohort_id

Integer specifying the cohort_id to use for the z-score calculation

...

<tidy-select> Columns names of parameters to calculate a z-score of

Value

A tibble including z-score columns
